sys_script_include.description:
Various Time Card functions
cardsByChargeCode(chargeCode, timeSheet) Returns: GlideRecord object of cards with a specific time code for a time sheet. chargeCode: Valid Values are "Capital" and "Expense" timeSheet: Can take a TimeSheet object, GlideRecord, or Sys_Id.
getTimeCardRecord(timeSheet, category) timeSheet: Can take a TimeSheet object, GlideRecord, or Sys_Id.
sys_script_include.name: TimeCardUtils
